chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 13 has the above problem:
Installing individual apps like WhatsApp is not possible. The app can be downloaded but cannot be used. Data cannot be transferred either.
Best regards,
Schnödewind

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Please relay the message to the customer that we are sorry that the customer is unhappy with our product. Rather than sending a return, would the customer consider a 40 euros commercial gesture instead? The customer could save the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers in facilitating a return of a device which is perfectly functional and fit to use for many years ahead. 

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile,

Thank you for your message. 

A partial refund is not beneficial since the customer cannot access applications and transfer data. 

Please kindly repair or exchange item. 

We are grateful for your cooperation. 

Kind regards,
Tansu from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We await the arrival of the parcel

Regards,
JH

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for repair on the 03.06.24. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 07.03.24 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Tansu from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue, and we do not have sufficient stock for an exchange. We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards, 
AS
